name: 2024 Int'l Conference on Preschool Education and Child Development
content: 2024 Int'l Conference on Preschool Education and Child Development (PECD 2024) will be held during Oct. 25-27, 2024 in Guilin, China. This Conference will cover issues on Preschool Education and Child Development. The aim of PECD 2024 is to provide a stage for researchers, engineers, academicians as well as industrial professionals from all over the world to present their latest research results and advanced research methods.
